channel.title: hhs on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in hhs on Barefoot Rob

item.title: prepping for Head Heart and Soul workshop
item.description: 12:00 Monday 02 January 2017 JST John Gaughan suggested I run Head Heart and Soul workshops in Tokyo in order to invite more people to do the type of personal growth work we do in my men’s group. I’ve just finished porting from PDF to Google Drive their notes, which Soness and I will use to prepare for presenting the workshop.

item.title: excited about presenting Head Heart and Soul
item.description: 12:57 Monday 07 November 2016 JST Soness and I got on Zoom with Russell who recently led a Head Heart and Soul workshop, and basically walked us through the idea. It looks like it will be quite fun and eye-opening for us and others who attend!

item.title: Great resources
item.description: 17:48 Sunday 16 October 2016 AWST Okay, so we’re going to do some Head Heart ans Soul workshops in Tokyo. John said he’ll send me the protocol, and I’ll show it to Rohini; I think (hope!) she’ll be really into the idea. We’ll run a few of those, and then I’ll contact Ken who said he’ll come out for a PIT if we have 20 participants. Shadow Work workshops that John and Rhonda lead may also be good.
